summary: Worker fails to connect using intermediate certificates on macOS with 'UnknownIssuer' error when following the mTLS tutorial with the tls-full sample. The issue appears to be related to how gRPC-Node handles certificate chains on macOS.
userImpact: Users on macOS cannot establish secure connections to Temporal servers using intermediate certificates, blocking mTLS deployment on that platform.
rootCause: gRPC-Node issue with certificate chain validation on macOS when intermediate CAs are involved; likely related to grpc/grpc-node#1784 where the issuer certificate cannot be resolved.
workaround: Use only a root CA without intermediate certificates; ensure certificates are generated with SHA256 instead of SHA1.
resolutionDetails: Issue was resolved, likely through gRPC-Node updates or SDK changes to handle certificate chains properly.
keyQuote: I believe that is this issue: https://github.com/grpc/grpc-node/issues/1784
